## remove variable

Function that deletes all keys that match a specific pattern and its value from the namespace of the client on the redis server

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove: (clientId: string, keyPattern: string, deletePatternMatches?: boolean) => Promise<void>
```

## Example

// example 1 (only delete the key that matches the keyPattern) await remove('client1', 'key1'); // example 2 (delete all keys that start with the keyPattern) await remove('client1', '/dashboard', true);
